name: Pinzzo
description:
Have fun with a pixel art puzzle game. and minimalist with 150 levels.
Play and discover all the paths the ball will take to pass the level.

Click on the cannon to shoot the ball.


To rotate the obstacles just click exactly on top of them.


If you have already fired and realized that the ball will not follow the correct path, click on the cannon again to fire again.


Nothing in this game is exact or perfect, your eyes can be tricked.

You need to place all the platforms correctly, if not, the ball might get lost on the way. One click can make a difference!!!!

If positioned wrong, the platforms, and already fired. Click the cannon again to stop firing, reposition the platform and fire again.

Not everything always follows a single path, sometimes if you think a little more, you can find other paths.
